title: This is great...
body: and all I've done is enter my name! "Thrillhouse."

replies.body: I don't quite get the context of this thread but okay.

Amazing, a true masterpiece. I just love modern art.

I think the shit stain on white canvas is my favourite piece.
i like andy warhol, apparently him eating a burger was https://img.memesuper.com/09d8d0cdf8c66dcf9d2d0b25c3f797d9_a-meme-and-the-iron-giant-art-meme-iron-giant_500-348.jpeg
But the shit stain on white canvas represents the league of legends community to the point. Blemished Purity.
